content: pull through the remaining sts fasten_off tightly and weave in ends thicker hat co 88 sts join to begin working in the round being careful not to twist work p1 k1tbl rib for 4 rounds set up round *p1 knit the next stitch through back and front of the loop p1 k1tbl 9 times knit the next stitch through back and front of the loop k1* repeat * * altogether four times you should now have 96 sts work odd row of chart 1 twice work chart 1 row 1 3 5 7 and 9 once more work chart 2 once cut yarn and pull through the remaining sts fasten_off tightly and weave in ends virtauksia hat pattern and photos ©tiiq http //tiiq vuodatus net kiertorata@gmail com page 2 of 3 any commercial use of the pattern is prohibited tips pattern repeat in both hats is relatively long if you want to increase the depth of the hat only slightly work a few more rounds of brim ribbing decreasing the depth slightly is easiest when working a few more rounds of brim ribbing and then omitting one pattern repeat greater changes in hat depth are best achieved by adding or omitting full pattern repeats chart 1 12 o /i\ o 11 10 o / \ o 9 8 o / \ o 7 6 o / \ o 5 4 o / \ o 3 2 o / \ o 1 chart 2 /i\ 11 / \ 10 / \ 9 / \ 8 /i\ 7 / \ 6 / \ 5 / \ 4 / \ 3 / \ 2 /i\ 1 ktbl but k yo tfl p / k2tog \ ssk o yo /i\ k3tog virtauksia hat pattern and photos ©tiiq http //tiiq vuodatus net kiertorata@gmail com page 3 of 3 any commercial use of the pattern is prohibited
